lead_paragraph: -- More tidbits from the Lehman report: Hank Paulson knew that if Lehman collapsed, money market funds could break the buck.  (When the Reserve Primary Money Fund saw its net asset value fall below $1 the day after the Lehman filing, it forced investors to radically re-evaluate what they could treat as cash.)
snippet: And in today's Morning Take-Out: Bernanke's investmentsm Hank Paulson's premonition, and defining the sophisticated investor.
abstract: And in today's Morning Take-Out: Bernanke's investmentsm Hank Paulson's premonition, and defining the sophisticated investor.
